ModMetaData.name: Corrected WorkGivers
ModMetaData.author: kaptain_kavern
ModMetaData.description:
Re-introduce the old "Repair" worktype, so now Construction and Repair are two different skills in the work-planner.
Also contain a XML patches that makes "Stone Cutting" depending on the "Construction skill" and bring back the old "Repair" worktype
Be cautious to plan your work priorities accordingly.
